segments.text: Jill , how do you like your new job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like it . But how did you know about my new job ? I wanted to surprise you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just heard through the grapevine something about you landing a job with some travel agency down town . You can still fill me in on tile details .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , two weeks ago I got a tip about a possible job opening at Ace Travel Agency over on Franklin Avenue .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , I think I know the place .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , anyway , I made a beeline over to their office , had an interview with the manager , and was told to start work the next day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s really great , jill . So , what do you do there exactly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right now I ’ m basically just a secretary , but if I ’ m given the chance , I want to become a travel agent there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t tell me your ’ re already bucking for a promotion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , of course not . I ’ Ve got a lot to learn yet . In the meantime , I just want to be a good secretary and not step on anyone ’ s toes .
segments.speaker: S2
